meta.title: eBPF Case Studies
meta.description: Learn how eBPF is used in different projects.
meta.keywords: ebpf, bpf, contribute, getting started, community

Here are some of the organizations that: Here are some of the organizations that are using eBPF in production. If you're using eBPF and aren't on this list, <2>please submit a pull request</2>.

items.title: Google
items.description: Google uses eBPF for security auditing, packet processing, and performance monitoring

items.title: Netflix
items.description: Netflix uses eBPF at scale for network insights

items.title: Android
items.description: Android uses eBPF to monitor network usage, power, and memory profiling

items.title: S&P Global
items.description: S&P Global uses eBPF through Cilium for networking across multiple clouds and on-prem

items.title: Shopify
items.description: Shopify uses eBPF through Falco for intrusion detection

items.title: Cloudflare
items.description: Cloudflare uses eBPF for network security, performance monitoring, and network observability

items.title: Microsoft
items.description: Microsoft uses eBPF to enhance the observability and inspection of processes within Kubernetes

items.title: Polar Signals
items.description: Polar Signals uses eBPF to monitor and measure cross-zone network traffic

items.title: Samsung
items.description: Samsung uses eBPF in their android devices for networking

items.title: Ikea
items.description: Ikea uses eBPF through Cilium for networking and load balancing in their private cloud

items.title: Apple
items.description: Apple uses eBPF through Falco for kernel security monitoring

items.title: Meta
items.description: Meta uses eBPF to process and load balance every packet coming into their data centers

items.title: DoorDash
items.description: DoorDash uses eBPF through BPFAgent for kernel level monitoring

items.title: Datadog
items.description: Datadog uses eBPF for networking and security in their SaaS product

items.title: Alibaba
items.description: Alibaba uses eBPF through Cilium to provide networking in their cloud

items.title: Red Hat
items.description: Red Hat uses eBPF at scale for load balancing and tracing in their private cloud

items.description: eBPF is the technlogy that powers Isovalent's enterpise networking, observability and security solutions

items.description: Palantir uses eBPF to debug networking problems

items.description: Cruise uses eBPF to monitor GPU performance

items.description: Digital Ocean uses eBPF to monitor GPU performance

items.description: The New York Times uses eBPF for networking

items.title: SentinelOne
items.description: SentinelOne uses eBPF to detect and to respond to runtime threats like ransomware and zero-day exploits in real time.

items.title: Aqua Security
items.description: Aqua Security uses eBPF to handle runtime detection and forensics

items.title: Oligo Security
items.description: Oligo Security uses eBPF for application security observability and protection

items.description: Akita uses eBPF at scale for API observability

items.title: groundcover
items.description: groundcover uses eBPF to instantly monitor application performance in cloud native environments, at any scale.

items.title: Line Coporation
items.description: Line Corporation uses eBPF at scale for load balancing and tracing in their private cloud

items.title: Exein
items.description: Exein uses eBPF in their open source runtime security framework for IoT

items.title: Ant Group
items.description: Ant Group uses eBPF in their cloud native security platform for vulnerability live-patching, and system anomaly detection

items.title: Sysdig
items.description: Sysdig uses eBPF to enable high-performance system call tracing, facilitate container-aware troubleshooting, conduct security auditing, and provide rich insights and data from the kernel

items.title: Kodem
items.description: Kodem uses eBPF for application visibilty and runtime intelligence

items.title: Cycode
items.description: Cycode uses eBPF for CI/CD security

items.title: Wiz
items.description: Wiz uses eBPF to provide real-time threat detection and monitoring within cloud workloads

items.title: Core Tech
items.description: Core Tech uses eBPF to filter out unwanted traffic and mitigate DDoS attacks

items.title: FlowSecurity
items.description: Flow Security uses eBPF technology to analyze data in motion for data discovery, classification, risk management, and data violation detection and response

items.title: Helios
items.description: Helios uses eBPF in their runtime analysis tool for observability and security

items.title: ThreatX
items.description: ThreatX uses eBPF for securing their runtime environment and delivering real-time blocking for runtime threats

items.title: Levo
items.description: Levo uses eBPF for API discovery and documentation

items.title: Traceable
items.description: Traceable uses eBPF for enhanced data collection

items.title: ArvanCloud
items.description: ArvanCloud uses eBPF for their CDN product

items.description: RAD Security uses eBPF for runtime threat detection and supply chain verification

items.title: Qpoint
items.description: Qpoint uses eBPF to monitor and secure egress traffic to your external vendor APIs

items.title: Attribute
items.description: Attribute uses eBPF to provide real time, no tagging cloud cost visibility and attribution for dynamic environments

items.title: ProtectAI
items.description: Protect AI uses eBPF to secure LLM applications in production at runtime, providing visibility for advanced threat detection and response capabilities
